channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large Branch obstructing pavement, 29th June
item.description:
Tree branch that has partly fallen off is obstructing the pavement and pedestrians are having to cross road - buggies and wheelchairs will not be able to pass

item.title: Abandoned van been in front of our house for around 6 months, 29th June
item.description:

item.title: Drain clearance required in Orange Place, 29th June
item.description:
We have experienced flash flooding in the past in Orange Place and this has been down to ineffective drainage. We would appreciate if the drains in Orange Place could be checked and cleared so that they will operate effectively in a heavy downpour situation.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Orange Place, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Compost bin, 29th June
item.description:
The food-waste bin has not been emptied for months opposite the block with flats 45-48 Carey Court. The door to the bin has been opened due to the weight of the contents and the contents are decomposing. It could cause a pest problem and it smells and looks horrible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Carey Court, Bexley, London

item.title: Fly Tipping, 29th June
item.description:
Of late there appears to be fly tipping on our neighbourhood streets on a commercial scale. There are several grey bin bags left around in various locations They seem to contain a mixture of garden and household waste. I already put the one left outside our property in our own bin. These are just the ones I’ve walked past recently, there is likely more scattered around nearby. 1 x rubbish bag left on the street
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 55, Sherington Road, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet
